metadata.title: CVE-2024-27756 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in GLPI v.10.0.12 and before allows a remote attacker to executearbitrary code, escalate privileges, and obtain sensitive information via acrafted script to the title field.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
